Protect your Bolens outdoor power product investment with Bolens original equipment parts and accessories.

FIND PARTS BY DIAGRAM

Find the original equipment parts and accessories for your Bolens outdoor power equipment on our Parts Diagrams. The Parts Diagram helps visualize components found on your equipment. If you can’t find what you’re looking for or need assistance installing the new part, call 1-800-269-6215.

FIND PARTS BY PART TYPE

Original equipment parts can help you maintain your Bolens outdoor power equipment long-term. Find parts by part type: Blades, Belts, Engine Parts, Cables, Pulleys, Tires and Wheels, Spindles and Universal Parts.

BLADES

When you need blades to deliver a clean cut and a healthier-looking lawn, look no further than Bolens original equipment blades. Bolens blades are designed to provide a precise fit with every blade change. Heat dipped for durability and flexibility, these blades have been tested for thousands of hours to meet equipment standards. Protect your Bolens outdoor power product investment with Bolens original equipment blades.

SHOP PARTS
BELTS

Bolens original equipment belts are manufactured to equipment specifications so you can attain a precise fit with every belt change. These belts have been designed to combat conditions. Made with durable, high strength materials, they’re designed to be flexible enough to withstand continuous bending around pulleys. Protect your Bolens outdoor power product investment with Bolens original equipment belts.

SHOP PARTS
ENGINE PARTS

Bolens original equipment engine parts are specifically designed for your outdoor power equipment’s engine. Shop air filters, oil filters, fuel filters, spark plugs and more. Protect your Bolens outdoor power product investment with Bolens original equipment engine parts.

SHOP PARTS
CABLES

When it’s time to replace the cable in your Bolens outdoor power equipment, you’ll find the exact part you need. Protect your Bolens outdoor power product investment with Bolens original equipment cables.

SHOP PARTS
PULLEYS

A properly working pulley helps your machine perform with maximum power. You can find the exact part you need when it’s time to replace a pulley on your Bolens riding lawn mower or snow blower. Protect your Bolens outdoor power product investment with Bolens original equipment pulleys.

SHOP PARTS
TIRES AND WHEELS

A proper-fitting tire will help your Bolens riding mower, walk-behind mower and snow blower to have a smooth and sturdy ride. Replace tires and wheels as they wear to help make sure your Bolens outdoor power equipment runs at optimal performance. Protect your Bolens outdoor power product investment with Bolens original equipment tires and wheels.

Find the spindle assembly parts you need to help maintain your Bolens lawn mower’s performance so your lawn looks pristine. Protect your Bolens outdoor power product investment with Bolens original equipment spindles.
